results.title: Comparison of rosiglitazone and metformin for treating HIV lipodystrophy: a randomized trial.

results.title: Metformin increases HDL3-cholesterol and decreases subcutaneous truncal fat in nondiabetic patients with HIV-associated lipodystrophy.

results.title: Differential effects of metformin and exercise on muscle adiposity and metabolic indices in human immunodeficiency virus-infected patients.
results.text_hl: We previously showed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and exercise improve @DISEASE_Hyperinsulinism @DISEASE_MESH:D006946 @@@hyperinsulinemia@@@ more than @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ alone in @<m>DISEASE_HIV_Associated_Lipodystrophy_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D039682 @@@HIV-lipodystrophy@@@.
